# Audit Progress Tracker

**Purpose:** Track progress through `.github/COMPREHENSIVE_AUDIT.md` so different AI agents/sessions can continue work.

**Last Updated:** [AI should update this timestamp]
**Session:** [Session identifier or date]

## Instructions for Next AI Session

To continue work:

1. Read this tracker file
2. Check last completed phase
3. Continue from next unchecked item
4. Update checkboxes as you complete tasks
5. Add outputs to appropriate sections
6. Update "Last Updated" timestamp
7. Add notes in "Current Session Notes"

Example:
```
**Last Updated:** 2024-11-28 14:00
**Session:** Continuing Phase 12 - Marketing

Completed:
- ✅ Phase 12.1 - Content research
- ✅ Phase 12.2 - Generated 10 article ideas

Currently working on:
- Phase 12.4 - Drafting first 3 articles

Next up:
- Phase 12.5 - Community building plan
```
